# Vercel Environment Variables - Copy/Paste These Exact Values

## Critical: Use these EXACT values in Vercel Dashboard

NODE_ENV=production
SAML_DEBUG=true

# SP Configuration URLs
SP_ENTITY_ID=https://shibboleth-login-t1to.vercel.app/metadata
SP_CALLBACK_URL=https://shibboleth-login-t1to.vercel.app/api/auth/callback
SP_LOGOUT_CALLBACK_URL=https://shibboleth-login-t1to.vercel.app/api/auth/logout/callback

# CORS Configuration
FRONTEND_URL=https://shibboleth-login-t1to.vercel.app
ALLOWED_ORIGINS=https://shibboleth-login-t1to.vercel.app

# Critical: Private Key (MUST be single line with \n for line breaks)
SP_PRIVATE_KEY=-----BEGIN PRIVATE KEY-----\nMIIEvgIBADANBgkqhkiG9w0BAQEFAASCBKgwggSkAgEAAoIBAQC5JUUQwP\\n-----END PRIVATE KEY-----

# Critical: Certificate (MUST be single line with \n for line breaks)
SP_CERT=-----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----\nMIIDDzCCAfegAwIBAgIUW53aMYe/7iSPe8lOM9StVzkra/cwDQYJKoZIhv\\n-----END CERTIFICATE-----

# Clear file-based paths for Vercel
SP_PRIVATE_KEY_FILE=
SP_CERT_FILE=

# Other required variables
JWT_SECRET=your-jwt-secret-here
JWT_REFRESH_SECRET=your-refresh-secret-here
IDP_SSO_URL=https://idp.slgti.ac.lk/idp/profile/SAML2/Redirect/SSO
IDP_SLO_URL=https://idp.slgti.ac.lk/idp/profile/SAML2/Redirect/SLO
IDP_CERT=your-multi-cert-string-here
SESSION_SECRET=your-session-secret-here

# SAML Configuration
SAML_WANT_ASSERTIONS_SIGNED=false
SAML_WANT_RESPONSE_SIGNED=true
SAML_SIGN_REQUESTS=false
REQUESTED_ATTRIBUTES=email,displayName,uid,eduPersonAffiliation,eduPersonPrincipalName,eduPersonScopedAffiliation,eduPersonOrgUnitDN,mobile,telephoneNumber
